com.lhings.library

Annotation Type Stats


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Stats
    Use Stats to annotate the methods that return statuses of your device. The method must not have any arguments and must return one of the following types: int, float, boolean, String or Date.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the status returned by the method annotated with Stats.
      java.lang.String type
      The type of the status returned by the method annotated with Stats.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of the status returned by the method annotated with Stats.
        Returns:

      • type

        public abstract java.lang.String type
        The type of the status returned by the method annotated with Stats. See Action for a list of the types recognized by this annotation.
        Returns:
